remarks: The coefficient function is one-to-one, so if the coefficients are equal then the functions are equal and vice-versa.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)
statement:
coefv0.1 $e |- A = ( coeff ` F ) $.
coeadd.2 $e |- B = ( coeff ` G ) $.
coe11 $p |- ( ( F e. ( Poly ` S ) /\ G e. ( Poly ` S ) ) -> ( F = G <-> A = B ) ) $.
